title: Canto da Terra
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of November 2015, the best place for vegan choices in the area. Most food is organic with a focus on local native fruits. Offers vegan pizza, juices, smoothies and more.
streetAddress: Rua Luiz Alves Da Costa, 715, Inside Praca da Paz
